thread.title: Boston snow kitesurfer catches some air

title: Boston snow kitesurfer catches some air
text:
Boston snow kitesurfer catches some air 2:48pm GMT - 00:47 
A Boston-area man appeared to be having the time of his life Friday, taking advantage of the recent snowfall by kitesurfing in the frigid winds. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A Boston-area man appeared to be having the time of his life Friday, taking advantage of the recent snowfall by kitesurfing in the frigid winds. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
